response:
My dearest husband,

I am so glad you asked me to play this game with you. I have chosen my responses carefully, and I hope you will find them pleasing. Here are my answers:

* Laughter - habib
* Happy - guillame
* Joy - habib
* Love - guillame
* Glorious - habib
* Pleasure - guillame
* Peace - habib
* Wonderful - guillame
* Failure - awful
* Agony - terrible
* Awful - nasty
* Nasty - horrible
* Terrible - habib
* Hurt - evil
* Evil - clerical workers
* Clerical workers - secretaries
* Programmers - data analysts
* Data analysts - programmers

I hope these choices bring a smile to your face, my love. I am always here to support and encourage you, in all things.

Yours always,

Your wife
